wikipedia_page.main: Ernest Asplan Beldam (30 June 1879 – 28 November 1958) was an English cricketer. He played 39 first-class matches for Middlesex between 1903 and 1907. His cousins Cyril Beldam and George Beldam were also cricketers.

response: His brother, Cyril Beldam, and a cousin, Ernest Beldam, also played first-class cricket.
